short_desc: Statewide nutritionally enhanced frozen meal delivery program, with free customer nutritional counseling and meal planning by dietitians for regular diets such as diabetic, cardiac and weight loss diet
description: Statewide nutritionally enhanced frozen meal delivery program, with free customer nutritional counseling and meal planning by dietitians for regular diets such as diabetic, cardiac and weight loss diets.LifeSpring meals and snacks are delivered frozen and are easy to heat and serve. With two categories of meals plus snack  and dessert options there is more choices to fit your lifestyle and meet your dietary needs. Meals are healthy, delicious and approved by our registered dietitians. Every menu meets or exceeds guidelines set by the American Heart Association and the American Diabetes Association.
